cause.description:
Rubinstein-Taybi Syndrome is a physical and mental syndrome. There is a red birth mark in the middle of the forehead, the lip is sunkin in, the ears are lowered, big thumbs and big toes.. The brain works slower then a normal brain..Sometimes there are mis-norminality with organs..But sometimes everything is ok and it is just physical. Some children and adults have this syndrome and you dont even notice but others you can..Some poeple even pass away from this syndrome.. It is a very sad syndrome to live with..So please donate or just join by joining you are showing your support to the people that have Rubinstein-Taybi Syndrome.. For more info go to www.rubinstein-taybi.org This picture is Ryan Patrick DelJames Hodgins Son of Amber Colleen Simpson-Hodgins and Jeffrey William Hodgins, brother of Derek Alexander Fraser Hodgins and Taylor-Anne Margaret Destiny Hodgins of Kelowna, BC.
1. Position #1
cause.name: Rubinstein- Taybi Syndrome
